title: Image shared as Pankaja Munde crying after her Maharashtra election defeat was from her interview before elections
subtitle: The image in the post is a screengrab of Pankaja Munde interview with a news channel on 20th October 2019, Maharashtra elections. She hasn’t cried anywhere during that interview
author: factly.in
vclaim:
An image is being shared widely across social media claiming that it shows Maharashtra’s BJP leader Pankaja Munde crying after her defeat in the recent State’s elections. Let’s analyze the authenticity of that claim.



Claim: Image of Pankaja Munde crying after her defeat in Maharashtra General Elections-2019. Fact: The image in the post is a screengrab of Pankaja Munde’s interview with a news channel on 20 October 2019, but the Maharashtra Election results were declared on 24 October 2019. Moreover, Pankaja Munde hasn’t cried anywhere during that interview. So, the claim made in the post is FALSE.

From an article of ‘NDTV’, it can be found that the results of Maharashtra Assembly Elections-2019 were declared on 24 October 2019, and BJP leader Pankaja Munde has lost from the constituency ‘Parli’. In the image, it can be seen that news channel TV9 was interviewing Pankaja Munde. So when searched on YouTube, the interview video was found on the ‘YouTube’ channel of ‘TV9 Marathi’. But when one goes through the timestamp of that video, it was found to be uploaded on 20 October 2019, i.e. 3 days prior to the declaration of Maharashtra election results. Also, during the interview, Pankaja Munde hasn’t cried anywhere. The visual in the image can be seen at 1:42 secs of the interview video.

To summarize, this image is falsely being shared as Pankaja Munde crying after her Maharashtra election defeat.

Did you watch our new Episode of the DECODE series?
